issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

fields.summary: Vectorization: Vectorized order_null.q fails with deserialize EOF exception below TEZ ReduceRecordSource.processVectorGroup

comments.body:
+1 tests pending.

Quick suggestion - is columnNullMarker always the opposite of columnNotNullMarker?

The current patch makes it possible to pass ZERO, ZERO to both, which is probably not a valid situation.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12863454/HIVE-16448.01.patch

{color:green}SUCCESS:{color} +1 due to 3 test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 45 failed/errored test(s), 10561 tests executed
